page.title: 01INTRODUCTION
page.content: In the north west corner of this block is{HERTFORD}.There are many important and historical buildings,{the Castle,} County Hall and the court.The major schools are{Simon Balle}in the grounds of{Balls Park,}Richard Hale and Sele. Balls Park collage is part of Hatfield Polytechnic and has beautiful grounds. {Hertford Heath}is in the east of the block and{Haileybury Collage}whick is a boys private school is close by. {Ermine Street}runs through Hertford Heath.Apart from these urban areas the block has a lot of mixed woodland, some of which is old and lots of farmland which is mainly arable.The A10 (Ware bypass) runs through the north east corner of our block.There are three gravel pits situated in the northern sector of our area,some are still in use,others are now filled in.
